header.name: Cruz Max Nicolás

projectCard.title: Projects

remiseria.name: Remiseria
remiseria.description: It is a network for taxi service providers and clients to chat, a personal project to practice my React skills and explore some new technologies.

Mercado-Liebre.name: Mercado-Liebre

aboutMeBox.meDescription: I really enjoy learning and developing web applications. I care about delivering a quality product with good programming practices. I am good at working in a team; dedication and a positive attitude are my main drivers..
